Biggs Three Rivers Inn (formerly Travelodge) is conveniently located 104 miles east of Portland (20 miles east of The Dalles) at the intersection of I-84 and Hwy 97 (exit #104).
It is the perfect place to stop whether you're on your way to Canada, Washington, Idaho, Montana, Nevada or points in between. With easy freeway access as well as fun-filled activities to keep everyone in the family happy, Biggs Three Rivers Inn is a great place to plan a stopover.
Have a pet? No worries - Biggs Three Rivers Inn is pet friendly (for a small fee, with a three night maximum). They also have designated smoking and non-smoking rooms, free Internet service, complimentary continental breakfast as well as many other amenities . We cater to the business traveler and tourist alike. We also have plenty of parking to accommodate truck drivers as well.
The Columbia , Deschutes and John Day rivers are all nearby and provide ample opportunity for fishing, exploring and a plethora of water sports. The Mary Hill Museum Amphitheater and Winery are within five miles. There is a 24-hour family restaurant and 24-hour fast food restaurant within walking distance.
